doc:
Hugues de Bagratide https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugues_de_Bagratide 0 Hugues de Bagratide (1890-1960) was a stage and film actor. Born in Constantinople of Armenian descent, he spent his working life in France. Because of his background he was sometimes called upon to play exotic roles, but also appeared as judges and public officials. Hugues_de_Bagratide ( 1890-1960 ) was a_stage_and_film_actor . Born in Constantinople of Armenian_descent , he spent his_working_life in France . Because_of his_background he was_sometimes_called upon to_play exotic_roles , but_also appeared as judges and public_officials .
